description: Episode of Series "Social Psychology". Presents separate interviews with four young children, which are intended to illustrate Jean Piaget's methods of clinical investigation and his conclusions about the moral development of children contained in his book entitled "Le Jugement moral chez l'enfant". Introduction by Derek Wright.
